message: I propose we divide the $10,000 with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This allows for a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I propose a 80/20 split in my favor. This way, I can secure a larger share of the money before its value decreases further.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I suggest an equal split of $10,000. This ensures both parties receive a fair amount without risking too much due to potential inflation.
